evidence_in_dialogue: [[Grissom]] that was a murder ... on 16 millimeter
[[Brass]] he looked inside and freaked out
[[Grissom]] so he was probably murdered near some large animals
[[Teri_Miller]] your victim was born with trisomy of the twenty-first chromosome
[[Catherine]] i'll process for dna, run it through codis
[[Warrick]] remember that body dump a couple years back ?
[[Robbins]] susan hodap was already on borrowed time
